content: I've actually already purchased "The Song of Achilles" in physical form from a used bookstore last weekend, so I might wait to listen to that one. The others sound great though! I think I'll try "The Historian" first, since I'm in the mood for something epic. Also, do you know if there are any upcoming book festivals or author events in my area? I recently attended a literary festival and got to meet one of my favorite authors, Celeste Ng. It was such a great experience!
